title: 关于1.13的NBT检测问题
author: 淡漠jun
txt_content:
似乎1.13选择器能直接检测NBT了，但是具体怎么用
完全不会的那种

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content: execute as @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:carrot_on_a_stick",tag:{display:{Name:"{"translate":"uin.tool_2.name"}"},HideFlags:63,Unbreakable:1b,Damage:2}}}] run tag @s add uin_cur_select复制代码execute as @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:barrier"}}] run tag @s add uin_barrier复制代码execute if entity @e[tag=uin_blink,nbt={Age:21}] run kill @e[tag=uin_blink]复制代码一些例子

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
可以查看 Minecraft Wiki 有关页面Minecraft 1.13命令不会写？
按以前格式莫名报错？
命令根本执行不了？

?☆熱☆勁☆慡☆升☆級
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-786687-1-1.html
絕★對☆無★毒
點★擊☆秒★進
